channel.title: ::dice command
channel.description:
Can someone create that so it dose a random number.
Like c.foredChat("I have Rolled A -----"))
Sorry not the best coder :-D

item.title: ::dice command
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:4, topic:411556”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=512811.msg3721972#msg3721972 date=1313996074]

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) {
			final int Min = 1;
			final int Max = 6;
			final int random = (int) (Min + Math.random() * Max);
			c.forcedChat("I have rolled a " + random);
		}

[/quote]

This command seems to roll more low than High… … I made 1 min max 100[/quote]
Math.random() is entirely random. It won’t preference low or high.

Read full topic

item.title: ::dice command
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:411556”][code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“dice”)) {
final int Min = 1;
final int Max = 6;
final int random = (int) (Min + Math.random() * Max);
c.forcedChat("I have rolled a " + random);
}

[/code][/quote]

This command seems to roll more low than High… … I made 1 min max 100

Read full topic
